documentStructure.name: complete-structure
documentStructure.input:
# Executive Summary
This product solves X

## Problem Statement
Users face Y

## Value Proposition
We deliver Z

## Goals and Objectives
50% improvement

## Customer FAQ
Q: What does this do?

## Proposed Solution
We will build...

## Requirements
FR1: The system shall...

## Scope
In scope: X

## Stakeholders
Product team

## Timeline
Q1 2026

## Risks and Mitigation
Dependency on team X

## Traceability Summary
FR1 -> Problem 1

## Open Questions
TBD

## Known Unknowns & Dissenting Opinions
Team disagrees on approach

requirementsClarity.name: user-story-format
requirementsClarity.input: As a user, I want to save my progress so that I can continue later.

requirementsClarity.name: vague-qualifiers
requirementsClarity.input: The system needs to be fast, easy to use, and scalable.

requirementsClarity.name: measurable-requirements
requirementsClarity.input: Response time must be under 200ms. Support 10000 concurrent users. 99.9% uptime.

userFocus.name: detailed-personas
userFocus.input:
## User Personas

### Admin User
Administrators need to manage user accounts and permissions.

### End User
End users interact with the product daily for their workflows.

userFocus.name: problem-statement
userFocus.input:
## Problem Statement

Users currently struggle with manual data entry, wasting 10 hours per week. This solution will reduce that to 1 hour.

technicalQuality.name: acceptance-criteria
technicalQuality.input: Given a user is logged in, When they click save, Then their data is persisted within 500ms.

technicalQuality.name: nfr-requirements
technicalQuality.input:
## Non-Functional Requirements

- Performance: 99th percentile latency < 100ms
- Security: All data encrypted at rest
- Reliability: 99.95% uptime SLA

technicalQuality.name: dependencies-documented
technicalQuality.input:
## Dependencies

- Depends on Auth Service v2.0
- Requires database migration

## Risks

- Team availability during Q4
